Feature: Complete localStorage to Neon database migration

This commit completes the service layer migration, moving all data access
from localStorage to Neon PostgreSQL with dual-mode support.

Services Created \(18 total\):
- budgetService, budgetCategoriesService, budgetChaptersService
- budgetItemsService, budgetPaymentsService
- filesService, ganttTasksService \(NEW\)
- milestonesService, planningChangesService

- ProjectKPICards: Converted from useMemo to async useEffect
- DashboardPage: Async milestone data loading
